exercises.name: FARTLEK: Build Speed
exercises.instruction: Warm up 5 min easy. Then alternate: 1 min hard effort (RPE 8-9) / 2 min easy jog (RPE 4-5). Increase the hard effort by 30 sec each round until you reach 3 min hard. Cool down 5 min easy. Total ~45-60 min.

exercises.name: FARTLEK: Steady State
exercises.instruction: Warm up 5 min easy. Run at a comfortably hard pace (RPE 6-7) for 6 min, then drop to an easy jog for 4 min. Repeat 4-6 rounds. Cool down 5 min easy. Total ~55-65 min.

exercises.name: FARTLEK: Sprint Intervals
exercises.instruction: Warm up 10 min easy. Sprint at 90-95% effort for 20-30 sec, then walk or jog very easy for 90 sec. Complete 8-12 sprint rounds. Cool down 10 min easy. Total ~35-50 min.

exercises.name: FARTLEK: Pyramid
exercises.instruction: Warm up 5 min easy. Hard efforts in pyramid: 1 min, 2 min, 3 min, 4 min, 3 min, 2 min, 1 min — with equal-duration recovery jog between each effort. Cool down 5 min easy. Total ~45 min.

exercises.name: Tempo Run
exercises.instruction: Warm up 10 min easy. Run at threshold pace (RPE 7-8, able to speak only a few words at a time) for 20-30 min. Cool down 10 min easy. Total ~45-50 min.

exercises.name: Easy Recovery Run
exercises.instruction: Run at a fully conversational pace (RPE 4-5) for 30-45 min. Focus on relaxed form and controlled breathing. No need to push pace — this is active recovery.
